attributes.action: bring back the Radio 4 UK theme
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UK Theme was played for the last time on Radio 4 on Sunday 23rd April. 18,000 people signed a petition against this decision.  We now petition the Prime Minister to ask the BBC to reconsider its decision to remove the UK Theme from Radio 4 and reinstate it to its rightful position at the start of the day.
